description: Blue-eyed hunk Colton Grey just met ripped Damien Stone’s girlfriend, and she revealed that he always wants sex, but she isn’t always in the mood. Tattooed Colton gets her to say a few key words over the phone, and he records it so he can play it back for Damien when he gets home. At first, Damien thinks it’s really her until chiseled Colton turns around and shows himself. Dark-haired Damien doesn’t really know what Colton can do for him, but he is definitely too horny to pass up giving it a try.
title: Sex-Crazed Men Part 1: Bareback
